module.name: BusinessComponent
module.description: Business component objects that can be shared across applications.

datadefField.name: Future Cost Time Frame
datadefField.description: Time Frame From Scenario Start Date

datadef.name: Scenario Run
datadef.label: Scenario Run
datadef.source: dtopt.scenariorun sr inner join dtopt.scenario s on sr.scenarioid = s.scenarioid left outer join dtopt.zonegroup zg on sr.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid

datadefField.name: CostThresholdPct
datadefField.columnName: sr.CostThresholdPct * 100

datadefField.name: CostUpPassThruPct
datadefField.columnName: sr.CostUpPassThruPct * 100

datadefField.name: CostDownPassThruPct
datadefField.columnName: sr.CostDownPassThruPct * 100

datadefField.name: CompPriceUpThresholdPct
datadefField.columnName: sr.CompPriceUpThresholdPct * 100

datadefField.name: CompPriceThresholdPct
datadefField.columnName: sr.CompPriceThresholdPct * 100

datadef.name: Scenario Run Result
datadef.label: Scenario Run Result
datadef.source: dtopt.scenariorunresult srr inner join dtopt.scenariorunlocation srl on srr.scenariorunid = srl.scenariorunid and srr.locationid = srl.locationid inner join dtopt.scenariorunproduct srp on srr.scenariorunid = srp.scenariorunid and srr.productid = srp.productid INNER JOIN DTOPT.SCENARIORUNDEMANDGROUP SRDG ON SRP.PRODUCTDEMANDGROUPID = SRDG.PRODUCTDEMANDGROUPID and srr.scenariorunid = srdg.scenariorunid left outer join dtopt.competitor c on srr.competitorid = c.competitorid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT srtd.SCENARIORUNID, srtd.PRODUCTID, srtd.LOCATIONID, CASE COALESCE(srtd.RELATEDPRODUCTID, -1) WHEN -1 THEN rtrim(CHAR(srRule.SEQUENCE)) || '-' || srRule.NAME ELSE srp1.UPC || ': ' || rtrim(CHAR(srRule.SEQUENCE)) || '-' || srRule.NAME END AS TriggerDetail FROM dtopt.SCENARIORUNTRIGGERDETAIL srtd INNER JOIN dtopt.SCENARIORUNRULE srRule ON srRule.SCENARIORUNID = srtd.SCENARIORUNID AND srRule.SCENARIORUNRULEID = srtd.SCENARIORUNRULEID LEFT OUTER join dtopt.SCENARIORUNPRODUCT srp1 ON srp1.SCENARIORUNID = srtd.SCENARIORUNID AND srp1.PRODUCTID = srtd.RELATEDPRODUCTID ) AS td ON td.SCENARIORUNID = srr.SCENARIORUNID AND td.PRODUCTID = srr.PRODUCTID AND td.LOCATIONID = srr.LOCATIONID

datadefField.name: New Rpt GM %
datadefField.columnName: CASE WHEN COALESCE (srr.OPTVATREV, 0) !=0 then srr.OPTGROSSMARGIN2 / srr.OPTVATREV end

datadefField.name: Data Int 0
datadefField.description: Proc, Category Id or DT Category Id

datadefField.name: Data Int 1
datadefField.description: DT Category Id or Event Log ID

datadefField.name: Message
datadefField.columnName: CASE Code WHEN 90000 THEN 'ABC Stored Procs' WHEN 10000000 THEN 'ABC Trace' WHEN 10000001 THEN 'ABC Succeeded' WHEN 10000002 THEN 'ABC Failed' WHEN 10000003 THEN 'ABC Started' WHEN 2000005 THEN 'Copy Snapshot Started' WHEN 2000006 THEN 'Copy Snapshot Failed' WHEN 2000007 THEN 'Copy Snapshot Finished' WHEN 2000008 THEN 'Aggregation Started' WHEN 2000009 THEN 'Aggregation Failed' WHEN 2000010 THEN 'Aggregation Finished' WHEN 4000001 THEN CASE WHEN Data_String1 IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(Data_String1, 1, 2) = 'Z0' THEN 'Export Coefficients Started' ELSE 'Export Started' END WHEN 4000002 THEN CASE WHEN Data_String1 IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(Data_String1, 1, 2) = 'Z0' THEN 'Export Coefficients Failed' ELSE 'Export Failed' END WHEN 4000003 THEN CASE WHEN Data_String1 IS NOT NULL AND SUBSTR(Data_String1, 1, 2) = 'Z0' THEN 'Export Coefficients Finished' ELSE 'Export Finished' END WHEN 4000004 THEN 'Import Started' WHEN 4000005 THEN 'Import Failed' WHEN 4000006 THEN 'Import Finished' WHEN 6000001 THEN 'Optimization Failed' WHEN 6000003 THEN 'GAMS Started' WHEN 6000004 THEN 'GAMS Finished' WHEN 8000001 THEN 'Action Missing (Process framework)' WHEN 8000002 THEN 'Job Killed by Process framework' ELSE 'Do not remember the message' END

datadef.name: SRP Line DTCategory Exception
datadef.label: SRP Line DTCategory Exception
datadef.description: Contains products in the same line belonging to different dtcategories
datadef.source: dtopt.scenariorunproduct srp inner join (select srp.LineGroup, srp.scenariorunid FROM DTOpt.ScenarioRunProduct srp GROUP BY SRP.SCENARIORUNID, srp.LineGroup HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT(srp.DTCategoryId))>1) as x on srp.scenariorunid = x.scenariorunid and srp.LINEGROUP = x.linegroup INNER JOIN DTOPT.DTCATEGORY DC ON SRP.DTCATEGORYID = DC.DTCATEGORYID

datadef.name: SRP Line Size Exception
datadef.label: SRP Line Size Exception
datadef.description: Shows products in the same line and size family belonging to different size class
datadef.source: dtopt.scenariorunproduct srp inner join (select srp.LineGroup, srp.scenariorunid, srp.sizefamily FROM DTOpt.ScenarioRunProduct srp GROUP BY SRP.SCENARIORUNID, srp.LineGroup, srp.SIZEFAMILY having min (srp.SIZECLASS) != max (srp.sizeclass)) as x on srp.scenariorunid = x.scenariorunid and srp.LINEGROUP = x.linegroup and srp.sizefamily = x.sizefamily

datadef.name: SRP Tier Pricing Products Exception
datadef.label: SRP Tier Pricing Products Exception
datadef.description: Shows no valid products have TierFamily or have two TierClass in one dtcategory/zone
datadef.orderBy: Rule Name, DTCategory Id, Zone, TierFamily

datadef.name: Product Group Detail
datadef.label: Product Group Detail
datadef.source: dtopt.productgroupdetail pgd inner join DTOpt.Product p on pgd.productid = p.productid and p.IsActive=1 inner join DTOpt.ProductBrand pb on pb.ProductBrandID = p.ProductBrandID LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOpt.Manufacturer m on m.ManufacturerId = p.ManufacturerId

datadef.name: Zone Group
datadef.label: Zone Group
datadef.source: DTOpt.ZoneGroup zg inner join dtopt.division d on d.divisionid = zg.divisionid left outer join (select count(distinct(zd.locationid)) as numStores, z.zonegroupid from dtopt.zone z inner join dtopt.zonedetail zd on zd.zoneid = z.zoneid group by z.zonegroupid) as X on x.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid left outer join (select distinct(pcd.zonegroupid) as zonegroupid from dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd)as y on y.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid left outer join DTOPT.ORGANIZATION ORG on zg.organizationid = org.organizationid

datadefField.name: Active
datadefField.columnName: case when y.zonegroupid is not null then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: # Stores
datadefField.description: Number of stores in zone group

datadef.name: Zone Group Deletability Status
datadef.label: Zone Group Deletability Status
datadef.source: DTOpt.ZoneGroup zg

datadefField.name: ISPCDACTIVE
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select pcd.zonegroupid from dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASCPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.comppricezone cpz inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zoneid = cpz.zoneid) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASLOCATIONS
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.zonedetail zd inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zoneid = zd.zoneid) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: ISPARENTZONE
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.zone z2 inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zoneid = z2.parentzoneid) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASACTIVEPCZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z2.zonegroupid from dtopt.productcategoryzone pcz inner join dtopt.zone z2 on z2.zoneid = pcz.zoneid inner join dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd2 on pcd2.productcategoryid = pcz.productcategoryid and pcd2.zonegroupid = z2.zonegroupid where (pcz.competitorid1 is not null or pcz.competitorid2 is not null or pcz.competitorid3 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASACTIVEPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.productzone pz inner join dtopt.product p on p.productid = pz.productid inner join dtopt.zone z on pz.zoneid = z.zoneid inner join dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd on pcd.productcategoryid = p.productcategoryid and pcd.zonegroupid = z.zonegroupid where exists (select 1 from dtopt.zonedetail zd where zd.zoneid = z.zoneid) and (pz.notabilitytype != 0 or pz.attribute0 is not null or pz.attribute1 is not null or pz.attribute2 is not null or pz.attribute3 is not null or pz.attribute4 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASPCZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.productcategoryzone pcz inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zoneid = pcz.zoneid and (pcz.competitorid1 is not null or pcz.competitorid2 is not null or pcz.competitorid3 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.productzone pz inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zoneid = pz.zoneid) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASZONES
datadefField.columnName: case when zg.zonegroupid in (select z.zonegroupid from dtopt.zone z) then 1 else 0 end

datadef.name: Zone Deletability Status
datadef.label: Zone Deletability Status
datadef.source: DTOpt.Zone z

datadefField.name: ISPCDACTIVE
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zonegroupid in (select pcd.zonegroupid from dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASCPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select cpz.zoneid from dtopt.comppricezone cpz) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASLOCATIONS
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select zd.zoneid from dtopt.zonedetail zd) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: ISPARENTZONE
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select z2.parentzoneid from dtopt.zone z2) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASACTIVEPCZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select pcz.zoneid from dtopt.productcategoryzone pcz inner join dtopt.zone z2 on z2.zoneid = pcz.zoneid inner join dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd2 on pcd2.productcategoryid = pcz.productcategoryid and pcd2.zonegroupid = z2.zonegroupid where (pcz.competitorid1 is not null or pcz.competitorid2 is not null or pcz.competitorid3 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASACTIVEPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select pz.zoneid from dtopt.productzone pz inner join dtopt.product p on p.productid = pz.productid inner join dtopt.zone z on pz.zoneid = z.zoneid inner join dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd on pcd.productcategoryid = p.productcategoryid and pcd.zonegroupid = z.zonegroupid where exists (select 1 from dtopt.zonedetail zd where zd.zoneid = z.zoneid) and (pz.notabilitytype != 0 or pz.attribute0 is not null or pz.attribute1 is not null or pz.attribute2 is not null or pz.attribute3 is not null or pz.attribute4 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASPCZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select pcz.zoneid from dtopt.productcategoryzone pcz where ( pcz.competitorid1 is not null or pcz.competitorid2 is not null or pcz.competitorid3 is not null)) then 1 else 0 end

datadefField.name: HASPZMAPPING
datadefField.columnName: case when z.zoneid in (select pz.zoneid from dtopt.productzone pz) then 1 else 0 end

datadef.name: Zone
datadef.label: Zone
datadef.source: DTOpt.Zone z left outer join (select zoneID, count(ZoneDetailID) as numStores from dtopt.zonedetail zd group by zd.zoneID) as X on X.zoneID = z.ZoneID

datadefField.name: Processed Data
datadefField.columnName: case when PROCESSEDDATA is not null then CHAR(SCENARIORUNID) || '_' || CHAR(ZONEID) || '_' || CHAR(DTCATEGORYID) else '' end

datadef.name: Zone Group and Location Group
datadef.label: Zone Group and Location Group
datadef.source: (select z.ZoneGroupID as zonegroupid, lgd.LocationGroupID as locationgroupid, LG.NAME AS LOCATIONGROUPNAME, count(*) as count from DTOpt.ZoneDetail zd INNER JOIN DTOpt.Zone z ON z.ZoneID = zd.ZoneID INNER JOIN DTOpt.LocationGroupDetail lgd ON lgd.LocationID = zd.LocationID INNER JOIN DTOPT.LOCATIONGROUP LG ON LGD.LOCATIONGROUPID = LG.LOCATIONGROUPID group by z.ZoneGroupID, lgd.LocationGroupID, LG.NAME) as x

datadefField.name: Count
datadefField.description: Number of common stores between the Zone Group and Location Group

datadef.name: Product Info by Category
datadef.label: Product Info by Category
datadef.description: This query gives you total breakdown by category of modeled, sold, modeled_sold, with cost, with retail price, with base price and good for RBP or Optimization products
datadef.source: (select p.ProductCategoryID as ProductCategoryID, count(*) as count, SUM(mpl.hasCoefficients) as modeled, SUM(mpl.pIncPrd) as sold, SUM(mpl.hasCoefficients * mpl.pIncPrd) as modeledsold, SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(mpl.pCstD, 0.0) != 0.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as withcost, SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(mpl.pBsPrcM, 0.0) != 0.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as basepriced, SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(mpl.CurrentRetailPrice, mpl.pBsPrcM, 0.0) != 0.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as retailpriced, SUM(CASE WHEN mpl.pIncPrd = 1 AND COALESCE(mpl.CurrentRetailPrice, mpl.pBsPrcM, 0.0) != 0.0 AND COALESCE(mpl.pCstD, 0.0) != 0.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as goodforrbp, SUM(CASE WHEN mpl.hasCoefficients=1 and mpl.pIncPrd = 1 and COALESCE(mpl.pBsPrcM, 0.0) != 0.0 AND COALESCE(mpl.pCstD, 0.0) != 0.0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as goodforopt from DTOpt.ModelProductLocation mpl INNER JOIN DTOpt.Product p ON p.ProductID = mpl.ProductID WHERE p.IsApproved = 1 and p.IsActive = 1 group by p.ProductCategoryID) as x

datadef.name: Modeled Products by Category
datadef.label: Modeled Products by Category
datadef.source: (SELECT mpl.ProductCategoryId as ProductCategoryId, srlgd.LocationGroupId as LocationGroupId, srp.ScenarioRunId as ScenarioRunId, count(*) as count from DtOpt.ScenarioRunProduct srp INNER JOIN dtopt.ScenarioRunLocation srl ON srl.ScenarioRunId = srp.ScenarioRunId INNER JOIN dtopt.ModelProductLocation mpl ON mpl.ProductId = srp.ProductId AND mpl.LocationId = srl.LocationId AND mpl.pCstD IS NOT NULL AND mpl.pBsPrcM IS NOT NULL AND mpl.HasCoefficients = 1 AND mpl.pIncPrd = 1 INNER JOIN dtopt.ScenarioRunLocationGroupDetail srlgd ON srp.ScenarioRunId = srlgd.ScenarioRunId AND srlgd.LocationId = mpl.LocationId group by mpl.ProductCategoryId, srlgd.LocationGroupId, srp.ScenarioRunId) as x

datadef.name: Active Modeled Products
datadef.label: Active Modeled Products
datadef.description: Active Modeled Products by Zone Group
datadef.source: (select distinct zg.ZONEGROUPID AS ZONEGROUPID, ZG.NAME AS ZONEGROUPNAME, P.PRODUCTID AS PRODUCTID from dtopt.product p inner join dtopt.MODELPRODUCTLOCATION mpl on p.PRODUCTID = mpl.PRODUCTID INNER JOIN DTOPT.ZONEDETAIL ZD ON MPL.LOCATIONID = ZD.LOCATIONID INNER JOIN DTOPT.ZONE Z ON ZD.ZONEID = Z.ZONEID INNER JOIN DTOPT.ZONEGROUP ZG ON Z.ZONEGROUPID = ZG.ZONEGROUPID WHERE MPL.HASCOEFFICIENTS = 1 AND MPL.PINCPRD = 1) AS X

datadef.name: New Data CompPrice
datadef.label: New Data CompPrice
datadef.source: DTUpdate.CompPrice ucp inner join DTOpt.Product p on p.ProductID = ucp.ProductID inner join DTOpt.Location l on l.LocationID = ucp.LocationID inner join DTOpt.Competitor ctor on ctor.name = ucp.CompetitorName and ctor.isdeleted = 0 left outer join DTOpt.CompPrice cp on cp.ProductID = ucp.ProductID and cp.LocationID = ucp.LocationID and cp.CompetitorID = ctor.CompetitorID and cp.isdeleted = 0

datadef.name: New Data CompPriceZone
datadef.label: New Data CompPriceZone
datadef.source: DTUpdate.CompPriceZone ucp inner join DTOpt.Product p on p.ProductID = ucp.ProductID inner join DTOpt.Zone z on z.ZoneID = ucp.ZoneID inner join DTOpt.Competitor ctor on ctor.competitorid = ucp.CompetitorID and ctor.isdeleted = 0 left outer join DTOpt.CompPriceZone cp on cp.ProductID = ucp.ProductID and cp.ZoneID = ucp.ZoneID and cp.CompetitorID = ctor.CompetitorID and cp.isdeleted = 0

datadef.name: New Data VendorCost
datadef.label: New Data VendorCost
datadef.source: DTUpdate.ProductLocation VC INNER JOIN DTOPT.MODELPRODUCTLOCATION MPL ON VC.productid = mpl.productid and VC.locationid = mpl.locationid inner join DTOpt.Product p on p.productid = MPL.productid AND P.PRODUCTCATEGORYID = MPL.PRODUCTCATEGORYID inner join DTOpt.Location l on l.locationid = MPL.locationid

datadef.name: Model Product Location
datadef.label: Model Product Location
datadef.source: DTOPT.ModelProductLocation mpl INNER JOIN DTOPT.Product p ON P.ProductID = mpl.ProductID AND P.ProductCategoryID = mpl.ProductCategoryID INNER JOIN DTOPT.Location l ON mpl.LocationID = L.LocationID LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOPT.ProductLocationAttributes pla on mpl.productid = pla.productid AND mpl.locationid = pla.locationid

datadefField.name: Price
datadefField.columnName: (case when P.EquivalentUnits = 0 then -2123456789 else (CAST(mpl.pBsPrcM AS double) / P.EquivalentUnits) * COALESCE(mpl.multiple, 1) end)

datadefField.name: Volume
datadefField.columnName: mpl.pFstSlsD * COALESCE(p.EquivalentUnits, 1)

datadef.name: Model Product Location By Division
datadef.label: Model Product Location
datadef.source: DTOPT.ModelProductLocation mpl INNER JOIN DTOPT.Product p ON P.ProductID = mpl.ProductID AND P.ProductCategoryID = mpl.ProductCategoryID INNER JOIN DTOPT.Location l ON mpl.LocationID = L.LocationID inner join dtopt.productcategory pc on pc.productcategoryid = p.productcategoryid inner join dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd on pcd.productcategoryid = pc.productcategoryid and pcd.divisionid = l.divisionid inner join dtopt.zonegroup zg on zg.zonegroupid = pcd.zonegroupid and zg.divisionid = pcd.divisionid inner join dtopt.zone z on z.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid inner join dtopt.zonedetail zd on zd.zoneid = z.zoneid and zd.locationid = l.locationid LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOPT.ProductLocationAttributes pla on mpl.productid = pla.productid AND mpl.locationid = pla.locationid

datadefField.name: Price
datadefField.columnName: (case when P.EquivalentUnits = 0 then -2123456789 else (CAST(mpl.pBsPrcM AS double) / P.EquivalentUnits) * COALESCE(mpl.multiple, 1) end)

datadefField.name: Volume
datadefField.columnName: mpl.pFstSlsD * COALESCE(p.EquivalentUnits, 1)

datadef.name: Parent Party
datadef.label: Parent Party
datadef.source: Party P INNER JOIN PartyLink PL ON P.partyid = PL.ParentPartyId

datadef.name: Child Party
datadef.label: Child Party
datadef.source: Party P INNER JOIN PartyLink PL ON P.partyid = PL.ChildPartyId

datadef.name: Find Vendors
datadef.label: Find Vendors
datadef.source: (select distinct (vendorPartyid), retailpartyid, retailer.fullname RetailerFullName, vendor.fullname VendorFullName, rep.fullname RepFullName, apvendornumber from party vendor join partylink pl on pl.parentpartyid = vendor.partyid and partylinktypecode in ('rep') join party rep on rep.partyid = pl.childpartyid join vendorretailer vr on vr.vendorpartyid = vendor.partyid join party retailer on retailer.partyid = vr.retailpartyid where rep.partystatuscode='active'and vendor.Partystatuscode = 'active' group by retailpartyid, retailer.fullname, vendor.fullname , vendorPartyid, rep.fullname, apvendornumber ) as V

datadefField.name: Mfr Fax
datadefField.columnName: Mfr Fax

datadefField.name: Is Read By Work Flow User
datadefField.description: Is Read By Work Flow User

datadefField.name: Is Read By Work Flow User
datadefField.description: Is Read By Work Flow User

datadefField.name: Id
datadefField.description: RS SC SWY001i Event Type Id

datadef.name: MkdPlanProductLocation
datadef.label: MkdPlanProductLocation
datadef.source: dtmkd.plan p inner join dtprod.locationgroupdetailver lgd on lgd.locationgroupverid = p.locationgroupverid inner join dtmkd.planproduct pp on pp.planid = p.planid inner join dtopt.product prod on prod.productid = pp.productid inner join dtopt.mkdmodelproductlocation mkmpl on mkmpl.productid = pp.productid and mkmpl.locationid = lgd.locationid inner join dtopt.modelproductlocation mpl on mpl.productid = pp.productid and mpl.locationid = lgd.locationid inner join dtopt.location l on l.locationid = lgd.locationid

datadef.name: SQL_LastPOSInventoryModelDate
datadef.label: SQL_LastPOSInventoryModelDate
datadef.source: (SELECT p.planid, sr.scenariorunid, p.productcategoryid, p.divisionid, sr.datecreated FROM dtmkd.plan p INNER JOIN dtmkd.scenario s ON p.planid = s.planid AND s.SCENARIOID = p.SELECTEDSCENARIOID INNER JOIN dtmkd.scenariorun sr ON s.scenariorunid = sr.scenariorunid WHERE p.isDeleted = 0 AND p.isDeleted = 0 AND p.status = 2 AND p.startdate <= CURRENT DATE AND p.enddate >= CURRENT DATE GROUP BY p.planid , sr.scenariorunid , sr.datecreated , p.productcategoryid, p.divisionid ) AS p INNER JOIN dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd ON p.productcategoryid = pcd.productcategoryid AND p.divisionid = pcd.divisionid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT lastmodifieddate , productcategoryid , divisionid FROM dtopt.productcategorydivisionupdate cdu WHERE datatypeid = 1 ) pos ON pos.productcategoryid= pcd.productcategoryid AND pcd.divisionid = pos.divisionid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT lastmodifieddate , productcategoryid, divisionid FROM dtopt.productcategorydivisionupdate cdu WHERE datatypeid = 38 ) inv ON inv.productcategoryid= pcd.productcategoryid AND pcd.divisionid = inv.divisionid

datadef.name: SQL_OutDateAfterEOL
datadef.label: SQL_OutDateAfterEOL
datadef.source: (select mkdmpl.mkdModelProductLocationId, p.planid, pr.upc,l.customerlocationkey, l.storenumber, pr.productid,l.locationid, mkdmpl.customeroutdate,mkdmpl.endoflifedate FROM dtopt.zone z INNER JOIN dtopt.zonegroup zg ON z.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid INNER JOIN dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd ON pcd.zonegroupid = zg.zonegroupid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonedetail zd ON zd.zoneid = z.zoneid INNER JOIN dtmkd.plan p ON p.productcategoryid = pcd.productcategoryid AND p.divisionid = pcd.divisionid INNER JOIN dtprod.locationgroupdetailver lgdv ON p.locationgroupverid = lgdv.locationgroupverid AND zd.locationid = lgdv.locationid INNER JOIN dtmkd.scenario s ON p.planid = s.planid INNER JOIN dtmkd.planproduct pp ON pp.planid=p.planid INNER JOIN dtopt.mkdmodelproductlocation mkdmpl ON mkdmpl.productid = pp.productid AND mkdmpl.locationid = zd.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.modelproductlocation mpl ON mpl.productid =pp.productid AND mpl.locationid = zd.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.product pr ON pr.productid = pp.productid INNER JOIN dtopt.location l ON l.locationid = mpl.locationid WHERE mkdmpl.customeroutdate > mkdmpl.endoflifedate GROUP BY mkdmpl.mkdModelProductLocationId, p.planid, pr.upc,l.customerlocationkey, l.storenumber, pr.productid,l.locationid, mkdmpl.customeroutdate,mkdmpl.endoflifedate ) as r

datadef.name: SQL_MismatchZoneGroup
datadef.label: SQL_MismatchZoneGroup
datadef.source: (SELECT DISTINCT pl.planid PlanId, pl.name PlanName, l.storenumber , zg2.name CurrentZoneGroup, zg.name ExpectedZoneGroup FROM dtopt.location l INNER JOIN dtprod.locationgroupdetailver lgd ON lgd.locationid = l.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonedetail zd ON zd.locationid = l.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.zone Z ON zd.zoneid = z.zoneid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonegroup zg2 ON zg2.zonegroupid = z.zonegroupid INNER JOIN dtopt.mkdmodelproductlocation mkmpl ON mkmpl.locationid = l.locationid INNER JOIN dtmkd.planproduct p ON p.productid = mkmpl.productid INNER JOIN dtmkd.plan pl ON lgd.locationgroupverid = pl.locationgroupverid AND pl.planid = p.planid INNER JOIN dtopt.product prod ON prod.productid = p.productid INNER JOIN dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd ON pcd.divisionid = pl.divisionid AND pcd.productcategoryid = pl.productcategoryid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonegroup zg ON zg.zonegroupid = pcd.zonegroupid WHERE pl.isDeleted = 0 AND pl.status = 2 AND zg2.zonegroupid <> zg.zonegroupid AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM dtopt.location l_c INNER JOIN dtprod.locationgroupdetailver lgd_c ON lgd_c.locationid = l_c.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonedetail zd_c ON zd_c.locationid = l_c.locationid INNER JOIN dtopt.zone z_c ON zd_c.zoneid = z_c.zoneid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonegroup zg2_c ON zg2_c.zonegroupid = z_c.zonegroupid INNER JOIN dtopt.mkdmodelproductlocation mkmpl_c ON mkmpl_c.locationid = l_c.locationid INNER JOIN dtmkd.planproduct p_c ON p_c.productid = mkmpl_c.productid INNER JOIN dtmkd.plan pl_c ON lgd_c.locationgroupverid = pl_c.locationgroupverid AND pl_c.planid = p_c.planid INNER JOIN dtopt.product prod_c ON prod_c.productid = p_c.productid INNER JOIN dtopt.productcategorydivision pcd_c ON pcd_c.divisionid = pl_c.divisionid AND pcd_c.productcategoryid = pl_c.productcategoryid INNER JOIN dtopt.zonegroup zg_c ON zg_c.zonegroupid = pcd_c.zonegroupid WHERE zg2_c.zonegroupid = zg_c.zonegroupid AND l.locationid = l_c.locationid AND pl_c.isDeleted = 0 AND pl_c.status = 2 AND pl.planid = pl_c.planid AND prod.productid = prod_c.productid ) ) as r

datadef.name: SQL_NickNameStats
datadef.label: SQL_NickNameStats
datadef.description: SQL_NickName Stats. Ideally it should return 0 rows
datadef.source: (SELECT t.card CARD, t.stats_time STATS_TIME, char(rtrim(t.tabschema) || '.' || rtrim(t.tabname),60) TABLE_NAME FROM syscat.tables t WHERE t.type = 'N' AND t.tabschema like 'DT%' AND t.tabschema != 'DTTMP' and t.tabname not like 'SYS%' ) as r

datadef.name: SQL_MkdModeledJobStatus
datadef.label: SQL_MkdModeledJobStatus
datadef.source: ( SELECT pc.productcategoryid as ProductCategoryId, pc.name as CategoryName, pc.mkdstatus as MkdStatus, pc.MkdModelRunId as MkdModelRunId FROM dtopt.dtcategory pc WHERE pc.MkdModelRunId is not null ) as r

datadef.name: Job Queue Summary
datadef.label: Job Queue Summary
datadef.source: dtmisc.runsummary rs INNER JOIN (SELECT applicationid,runid,MIN(beginjobtimestamp) AS runstart,MAX(endjobtimestamp) AS runend FROM dtmisc.jobqueue WHERE JOBTYPEID in (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 55) GROUP BY applicationid,runid ) pj ON pj.runid=rs.runid AND rs.applicationid=pj.applicationid LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOPT.SCENARIORUN SR ON RS.RUNID = SR.SCENARIORUNID
datadef.orderBy: Start Date Desc, Run Elapsed Desc

datadefField.name: Start Date
datadefField.columnName: DATE (RUNSTART)

datadefField.name: Run Elapsed
datadefField.columnName: CHAR(RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(HOUR (RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(MINUTE (RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(SECOND(RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2), 8)

datadefField.name: Non-Triggered Products Config
datadefField.description: Configures what will be the price of SKU/Stores that did not get triggered during price update.0 - Last Suggested Price (as of today), 1 - Current Retail Price

datadef.name: ModelOpt Product Out Of Sync
datadef.label: Model Opt Product Out Of Sync
datadef.description: Products that are out of sync between model and opt databases
datadef.source: (select p1.upc, p1.catalogproductid as Model_ProductId, p2.productid as Opt_ProductId, pc1.name as Model_ProductCategory, pc2.name as Opt_ProductCategory, dtc1.name as Model_DTCategory, dtc2.name as Opt_DTCategory, dg1.name as Model_DemandGroup, dg2.name as Opt_DemandGroup from dtmodel.modelproduct p1 inner join dtmodel.modelproductcategory pc1 on p1.modelproductcategoryid = pc1.modelproductcategoryid inner join dtmodel.modeldtcategory dtc1 on p1.dtcategoryid = dtc1.dtcategoryid inner join dtmodel.modeldemandgroup dg1 on p1.catalogdemandgroupid = dg1.catalogdemandgroupid inner join dtopt.product p2 on p1.upc = p2.upc inner join dtopt.productcategory pc2 on p2.productcategoryid = pc2.productcategoryid inner join dtopt.dtcategory dtc2 on p2.dtcategoryid = dtc2.dtcategoryid inner join dtopt.productdemandgroup dg2 on p2.productdemandgroupid = dg2.productdemandgroupid where p1.modelproductcategoryid != p2.productcategoryid or p1.dtcategoryid != p2.dtcategoryid or p1.catalogdemandgroupid != p2.productdemandgroupid) as r

datadef.name: Product MPL Out Of Sync
datadef.label: Product MPL Out Of Sync
datadef.description: Products category out of sync between product and MPL tables
datadef.source: (select p.productid as ProductId, p.upc, mpl.locationid, pc1.name as ProductCategory, pc2.name as MPL_ProductCategory from dtopt.product p inner join dtopt.ModelProductLocation mpl on p.productid = mpl.productid inner join dtopt.productcategory pc1 on pc1.productcategoryid = p.productcategoryid inner join dtopt.productcategory pc2 on mpl.productcategoryid = pc2.productcategoryid where p.productcategoryid != mpl.productcategoryid) as r

datadef.name: Openlink Logs
datadef.label: Openlink Logs
datadef.source: (select LogId, Name, ValueInt1, ValueString1, DateCreated from dtmisc.log where namespace = 'OL' or namespace = 'OpenLink' or namespace = 'DB2') as r

datadef.name: Openlink Log Details
datadef.label: Openlink Log Details
datadef.source: (select LogId, LogDetailId, ValueInt1, ValueInt2, ValueString1, ValueString2, ValueTimeStamp1 from dtmisc.logdetail) as r

datadef.name: Product Category Mismatch
datadef.label: Product Category Mismatch
datadef.description: Mismatch between category id in product and dtcategory tables, between dtcategory in product and product demand group tables
datadef.source: (SELECT p.ProductID, p.UPC, p.ProductCategoryID p_ProductCategoryID, dc.ProductCategoryID dt_ProductCategoryID, p.DTCategoryID p_DTCategoryID, dg.DTCategoryID dg_DTCategoryID, p.ProductDemandGroupID FROM dtopt.product p inner join dtopt.dtcategory dc on dc.dtcategoryid = p.dtcategoryid inner join dtopt.productdemandgroup dg on dg.productdemandgroupid = p.productdemandgroupid where (dc.productcategoryid != p.productcategoryid or dg.dtcategoryid != p.dtcategoryid) ) as x

datadefField.name: ProductCategoryID_dtcat
datadefField.description: Product Category ID in DT Category

datadefJoin.name: logdetail
datadefJoin.label: logdetail
datadefJoin.tableName: (SELECT logid, timestampdiff(2,CHAR(MAX(valuetimestamp1)-MIN(valuetimestamp1))) elapsed FROM dtmisc.logdetail GROUP BY logid)

datadef.name: Model POS Weekly
datadef.label: Model POS Weekly
datadef.source: DTOPT.PRODUCT P INNER JOIN dtmodel.modelproductcategory mpc on p.productcategoryid = mpc.modelproductcategoryid LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CATALOGPRODUCTID, max(weekenddate) LASTSCANDATE from dtmodel.modelposweekly GROUP BY CATALOGPRODUCTID) AS MPW ON P.PRODUCTID = MPW.CATALOGPRODUCTID

datadefField.name: Has POS 90 Days
datadefField.columnName: CASE WHEN (LASTSCANNEDDATE - 90 DAYS) <= LASTSCANDATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

datadef.name: AllowanceBillingPOSOffer
datadef.label: AllowanceBillingPOSOffer
datadef.source: DTABILL.Offer o inner join DTABILL.Offerallowance oa ON oa.offerid = o.offerid and oa.BILLINGDATASOURCE = 1

datadef.name: AllowanceBillingWROffer
datadef.label: AllowanceBillingWROffer
datadef.description: Show only Warehouse Receipt related Offers
datadef.source: DTABILL.Offer o inner join DTABILL.Offerallowance oa ON oa.offerid = o.offerid and oa.BILLINGDATASOURCE = 3 inner join DTABILL.Invoiceheader ih ON ih.Offerid = o.Offerid

datadef.name: AllowanceBillingFlatOffer
datadef.label: AllowanceBillingFlatOffer
datadef.description: Show only Flat Header and Flat Item related Offers
datadef.source: DTABILL.Offer o inner join DTABILL.Offerallowance oa ON oa.offerid = o.offerid and oa.BILLINGDATASOURCE = 4

datadef.name: AllowanceBillingWarehouseDetails
datadef.label: AllowanceBillingWarehouseDetails
datadef.description: Show Warehouse Details for an Offer
datadef.source: dtabill.warehousereceipt wr inner join dtabill.invoicedetailwarehouserecpt invdwr ON invdwr.warehousereceiptid = wr.warehousereceiptid

datadef.name: SRP DTCategory DemandGroup Mismatch
datadef.label: SRP DTCategory DemandGroup Mismatch
datadef.description: Contains products which DTCategory is different than its DemandGroup DTCategory
datadef.source: dtopt.scenariorunproduct srp inner join dtopt.SCENARIORUNDEMANDGROUP srdg on srdg.productdemandgroupid = srp.productdemandgroupid and srdg.scenariorunid = srp.scenariorunid inner join dtopt.DTCATEGORY dtc on dtc.DTCATEGORYID = srp.dtcategoryid inner join dtopt.DTCATEGORY dtcdg on dtcdg.DTCATEGORYID = srdg.DTCATEGORYID

datadefJoin.name: Competitor Count
datadefJoin.label: Competitor Count
datadefJoin.tableName: (select cc.cpiid, count(*) compcount FROM DTOpt.CpiCompetitor cc GROUP BY cc.cpiid )

datadefField.name: Weight
datadefField.columnName: WEIGHT * 100

datadef.name: Promotion Job Queue Summary
datadef.label: Promotion Job Queue Summary
datadef.source: dtmisc.runsummary rs INNER JOIN (SELECT applicationid,runid,MIN(beginjobtimestamp) AS runstart,MAX(endjobtimestamp) AS runend FROM dtmisc.jobqueue WHERE JOBTYPEID in (60,61,62,63,64,102) GROUP BY applicationid,runid ) pj ON pj.runid=rs.runid AND rs.applicationid=pj.applicationid LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOPT.PROMOTION PROMO ON RS.RUNID = PROMO.PROMOTIONRUNID
datadef.orderBy: Start Date Desc, Run Elapsed Desc

datadefField.name: Start Date
datadefField.columnName: DATE (RUNSTART)

datadefField.name: Run Elapsed
datadefField.columnName: CHAR(RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(HOUR (RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(MINUTE (RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(SECOND(RUNEND - RUNSTART))), 2), 8)

datadefField.name: Calculation Status
datadefField.columnName: CASE promo.PROMOTIONRUNSTATUS WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 4 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 5 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 18 ELSE 1 END WHEN 2 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 7 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 8 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 13 ELSE 1 END WHEN 3 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 10 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 11 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 14 ELSE 1 END WHEN 4 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 16 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 17 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 19 ELSE 1 END WHEN 99 THEN 99 ELSE 1 END

datadef.name: Category Plan Job Queue Summary
datadef.label: Category Plan Job Queue Summary
datadef.source: dtmisc.runsummary rs INNER JOIN (SELECT applicationid,runid,MIN(beginjobtimestamp) AS runstart,MAX(endjobtimestamp) AS runend FROM dtmisc.jobqueue WHERE JOBTYPEID in (32,33,34,35,36,103) GROUP BY applicationid,runid ) pj ON pj.runid=rs.runid AND rs.applicationid=pj.applicationid LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOPT.CalendarRun CR ON RS.RUNID = CR.CALENDARRUNID LEFT OUTER JOIN DTOpt.Calendar c ON cr.CalendarID = c.CalendarID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT dtcat.ProductCategoryID, MAX(dtcat.ModelRunID) AS modelRunID FROM DTOpt.DTCategory dtcat GROUP BY dtcat.ProductCategoryID) AS catModelStatus ON catModelStatus.ProductCategoryID = c.ProductCategoryID
datadef.orderBy: Start Date Desc, Run Elapsed Desc

datadefField.name: Start Date
datadefField.columnName: DATE (PJ.RUNSTART)

datadefField.name: Run Elapsed
datadefField.columnName: CHAR(RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(HOUR (RUNEND - PJ.RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(MINUTE (RUNEND - PJ.RUNSTART))), 2) || ':' || RIGHT ('0' || RTRIM(CHAR(SECOND(RUNEND - PJ.RUNSTART))), 2), 8)

datadefField.name: Calculation Status
datadefField.columnName: CASE cr.CalendarRunStatus WHEN 0 THEN CASE COALESCE(catModelStatus.modelRunID, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 8 ELSE 0 END WHEN 1 THEN CASE cr.CalendarRunType WHEN 1 THEN 1 WHEN 2 THEN 2 WHEN 3 THEN 9 WHEN 4 THEN 11 ELSE CASE COALESCE(catModelStatus.modelRunID, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 8 ELSE 0 END END WHEN 2 THEN CASE cr.CalendarRunType WHEN 1 THEN 3 WHEN 2 THEN 4 WHEN 3 THEN 10 WHEN 4 THEN 11 ELSE CASE COALESCE(catModelStatus.modelRunID, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 8 ELSE 0 END END WHEN 3 THEN CASE cr.CalendarRunType WHEN 2 THEN 6 ELSE 5 END WHEN 4 THEN 7 ELSE CASE COALESCE(catModelStatus.modelRunID, 0) WHEN 0 THEN 8 ELSE 0 END END

datadef.name: SQL_CompletionTimeStampAutomatedReopts
datadef.label: SQL_CompletionTimeStampAutomatedReopts
datadef.source: dtmkd.scenariorun sr INNER JOIN dtmkd.scenario s ON s.scenarioid = sr.scenarioid INNER JOIN dtmisc.jobqueue q ON q.runid =sr.scenariorunid WHERE DATE(sr.datecreated) > (current date - ( dayofweek(current date) days)) AND q.jobtypeid = 43 AND s.whocreated = 'System Generated'

datadef.name: ACV Generation Summary
datadef.label: ACV Generation Summary
datadef.description: Shows the ACV generation runs by Modeling or Script
datadef.source: dtmisc.log l inner join dtmisc.logdetail ld on l.logid = ld.logid where l.namespace = 'HistCompliance' and l.name = 'HistoricalComplianceGeneration' group by l.logid

datadefField.name: RunStartDate
datadefField.description: Date when the Generation is run

datadefField.name: TotalRunTime
datadefField.description: Total time to run in seconds
datadefField.columnName: timestampdiff(2, char(timestamp(max(ld.valuetimestamp1)) - timestamp(min(ld.valuetimestamp1))))

datadef.name: Historical Product Location ACV
datadef.label: Historical Product Location ACV
datadef.description: Historical Compliance ACV at the Product/Location Level

datadefJoin.name: PPG
datadefJoin.label: PPG
datadefJoin.tableName: (select pg.productgroupid, pg.name, pgd.productid from dtopt.productgroup pg inner join dtopt.productgroupdetail pgd on pgd.productgroupid = pg.productgroupid where pg.isdeleted = 0 and pg.usagetype = 1)

datadef.name: Historical Product ACV
datadef.label: Historical Product ACV
datadef.description: Historical Compliance ACV at the Product/Division Level

datadefField.name: Ad Revenue
datadefField.description: Average Weekly Promoted Revenue for Ad

datadefField.name: Display Revenue
datadefField.description: Average Weekly Promoted Revenue for Display

datadefField.name: Coupon Revenue
datadefField.description: Average Weekly Promoted Revenue for Coupon

datadefField.name: Loyalty Card Revenue
datadefField.description: Average Weekly Promoted Revenue for Loyalty Card

datadefField.name: Closeout Price Compliance High
datadefField.description: Is Close Out Price Compliance High

datadefField.name: Closeout Price Compliance Low
datadefField.description: Is Close Out Price Compliance Low

datadefField.name: Closeout Price Compliance Mean
datadefField.description: Is Close Out Price Compliance Mean

datadefField.name: Closeout Price Revenue
datadefField.description: Average Weekly Promoted Revenue for Is Close Out Price

datadef.name: POS Weekly
datadef.label: POS Weekly
datadef.description: Model POS Weekly at the Product/Location Level

datadefJoin.name: PPG
datadefJoin.label: PPG
datadefJoin.tableName: (select pg.productgroupid, pg.name, pgd.productid from dtopt.productgroup pg inner join dtopt.productgroupdetail pgd on pgd.productgroupid = pg.productgroupid where pg.isdeleted = 0 and pg.usagetype = 1)

datadefJoin.name: DT Category
datadefJoin.label: DT Category
datadefJoin.tableName: (select dc.productcategoryid, dc.lastmodelingdate from dtopt.dtcategory dc where dc.modelrunid is not null)

datadef.name: PromotionWithPackages
datadef.label: Package Promotion
datadef.source: DTOPT.PROMOTION promo where promo.hasPackage in (1,2)

datadef.name: PPRPromotion
datadef.label: Promotions with PPR data
datadef.source: DTOPT.PROMOTION promo where promo.promotionresultsstatus > -1

datadefField.name: Calculation Status
datadefField.columnName: CASE promo.PROMOTIONRUNSTATUS WHEN 0 THEN 1 WHEN 1 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 4 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 5 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 18 ELSE 1 END WHEN 2 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 7 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 8 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 13 ELSE 1 END WHEN 3 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 10 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 11 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 14 ELSE 1 END WHEN 4 THEN CASE WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 1 THEN 16 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 2 THEN 17 WHEN promo.promotionruntype = 3 THEN 19 ELSE 1 END WHEN 99 THEN 99 ELSE 1 END

datadef.name: MOPromotion
datadef.label: Promotions with Master Offer Data
datadef.source: DTOPT.PROMOTION promo

datadef.name: SQL_Multiple_PDs_For_A_LG
datadef.label: SQL_Multiple_PDs_For_A_LG
datadef.description: SQL Multiple PDs for a LG
datadef.source: ( SELECT t.promo as Promo, t.root as Root, t.zone as Zone, t.Count as Count FROM ( SELECT pd.promotionid promo, rootPDMap.RootPromotionDetailID root , pdz.ZoneID zone , COUNT(*) COUNT FROM DTOpt.PromotionDetail pd INNER JOIN TABLE(DTOpt.getRootPerfDetail(pd.PromotionDetailID)) AS rootPDMap ON 1=1 INNER JOIN DTOpt.PromotionDetailZone pdz ON pdz.PromotionDetailID = pd.PromotionDetailID WHERE pd.IsLeaf = 1 GROUP BY pd.promotionid , rootPDMap.RootPromotionDetailID, pdz.ZoneID ) t WHERE t.Count > 1 ) as r

datadef.name: SQL_ALL_LOCATIONS_OF_PROMOTION
datadef.label: SQL_all_locations_of_promotion
datadef.description: SQL All locations of a promotion
datadef.source: (select loc.promotiondetailid, loc. LOCATIONID, pd.promotionid from dtopt.promotiondetail pd inner join table (DTPROD.GETPDLOCVER(pd.PROMOTIONDETAILID)) loc on 1 = 1 ) as x
